{'filters': '{\"sort\":\"VOLUME_ONE_DAY\.response: The API retrieves information about collections on Blur.io, including real-time statistics such as floor price. Based on the input filters provided, the collections are sorted by their one-day trading volume in descending order. This allows users to identify the most actively traded collections within the last 24 hours. The response will include detailed data for each collection, such as name, floor price, trading volume, and other relevant metrics, enabling informed decision-making for trading or investment purposes.
